amendment.description: To require reports on protecting commercial aircraft from the threat of shoulder-fired missile systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1328 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1328 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9749-9751; text: CR S9749) To require reports on protecting commercial aircraft from the threat of shoulder-fired missile systems.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1328 proposed by Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1328 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
